sentence.Network_en: It is indeed a strange vicissitude of our science.
sentence.Network_cn: 这确实是我们科学的一个奇怪变迁.

sentence.Network_en: So great a vicissitude in his life could not at once be received as real.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的生活中发生了如此巨大的变迁,他一时还无法相信是真的.

sentence.Network_en: Idiosyncrasy and vicissitude had combined to stamp Sergeant Troy as an exceptional being.
sentence.Network_cn: 个人的特性和身世的沉浮都表明特罗依中士是一个非同寻常的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 变字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 变卖典质〖 selloutone'sestate〗 变迁〖 vicissitude;changes〗 变色〖 changecolor〗.
从语言内全息状态就不难理解“词是语句和语言的全息”了。每一个词如vicissitude（命运变化）【8】都是一个全息元，都是语句和语言的一部分，词作为一个全息元，包含着整体的全部信息；在viciss.
以v开头的英语英文单词 ... vicinal 邻近的，附近的 vicissitude 变化,变迁,荣枯,盛衰 victor 胜利者.
宪法权力不受简单立法过程的兴衰(vicissitude)所左右,故而第433A并不因为其间接违反宪法第72、161条之规定而导致无效, [86]因为其只是针对(制定法)司法上的减刑.

influence of culture vicissitude on high education of chinese women ., 文化变迁对中国女子高等教育的影响.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'alternation'): from French, or from Latin vicissitudo, from vicissim 'by turns', from vic- 'turn, change'

means.word_mean: 1. a variation in circumstances or fortune at different times in your life or in the development of something;

sentences.sentence: "the project was subject to the usual vicissitudes of exploratory research"

means.word_mean: 2. mutability in life or nature (especially successive alternation from one condition to another)

auth_sentence.content: Her girlish shyness...made the colour come and go in rapid vicissitude upon her cheek.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her girlish shyness...made the colour come and go in rapid vicissitude upon her cheek.
